Load necessary packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)
#install.packages("usmap")
library(usmap) #import the package
#library(ggplot2) #use ggplot2 to add layer for visualization
#install.packages("sp")
#install.packages("sf")
library(sp)
library(sf)

```

Load hydrogen projects data from google sheet
```{r}
gs4_deauth()
hydrogen_projects <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17YCMTTdN7yf_oA8eriyD9tPt1SePWWQmj-AvJY5lbiE/edit#gid=1245935679", sheet = "Projects")

hydrogen_projects
```

Test plotting lat and lon
```{r}
h2_df <- as.data.frame(hydrogen_projects)

h2_df <- h2_df %>% 
  select(lat = Latitude, lon = Longitude) %>% #add other fields here
  drop_na(lat) 

h2_transformed <- usmap_transform(h2_df)

plot_usmap(regions = "states") + 
  geom_point(data=h2_transformed, aes(x=x, y=y))



```
